artist: Artist: Willow Legge; Publisher: Circle Press, Guildford, England
creditline: Gift of funds from Robert F. Dibble
description: 9 folded sheets each containing one or more images; binding: in box; endpapers: of box: brown laid paper; slip case: cloth covered solander box; see also P.80.98 (plate that has been separated from this book)
medium: Blind intaglio, color screenprints, and letterpress; loose in portfolio
provenance: Acquistion funded by Robert F. Dibble through the Martin S. Ackerman Foundation, New York,1980.
title: Why the Sun and the Moon Live on the Sky, An African Folktale
